actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 6803) entitled "A bill for the relief of the estate of Colonel Leslie A. Skinner", to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims, a bill for the relief of a named individual's estate. Directs the Commissioner to report to the House of Representatives on the nature of the claim against the United States and the amount, if any, due such individual's estate from the United States.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 6803) entitled "A bill for the relief of the estate of Colonel Leslie A. Skinner", to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.
